channel.title: Please help

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @eagledude4 eagledude4
item.description:
@eagledude4 wrote:

type ::update SECONDS

for example ::update 60 (“server update in 1 minute”)

hope that helps

item.title: Please help
item.dc:creator: @Hotguy112344 Hotguy112344
item.description:
@Hotguy112344 wrote:

if (command.startsWith("update") && playerRights >= 2) { PlayerHandler.updateSeconds = (Integer.parseInt(command.substring(7)) + 1); PlayerHandler.updateAnnounced = false; PlayerHandler.updateRunning = true; PlayerHandler.updateStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis(); }
w00t it kicks all after the time is up then dont let anyone on you’ll have to maunally start up the server all over again tho
